| Property  | Attribute | Description                 | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |

| `display` | `display` |                             | `string` | `s.display` |
| `target`  | `target`  | Specifies a target element. | `string` | `undefined` |

| Event             | Description                       | Type               |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------ |
